+class _Formatter(object):
+    def __init__(self, tensor):
+        tensor = tensor.view(tensor.nelement())

+        self.sci_mode = False
+        self.max_width = 1

body: this looks strange -- you are calling ceil when floating_dtype is false but not when it's true?  Am I missing something here?
